' + Customer_Email,'') from wcms_Customer where Customer_ID = [Order_CustomerID]) as [CustomerName] ,Order_Phone ,Order_Email ,Order_Money ,Order_ShipFee ,Order_AdminNotes ,Order_PaymentGateway ,Order_RESULT ,Order_Code from wcms_Order { inner join wcms_Customer on Customer_ID = Order_CustomerID and Customer_FullName = @Search:CustomerName } where { Order_ID @Search:Order_ID and } { Order_Phone @Search:Order_Phone and } { Order_Email @Search:Order_Email and } { Order_Code @Search:Order_Code and } 1 = 1 ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
